post.body: Rode the SL last night at MCO. Been using it on the trainer only. Love that bike. BTW Kim, if you're reading this, the rear wheel is A-OK :)
Getting ready to leave the office in about 20 min. Will go to MCO and ride tempo for about 2½ hrs. 75° and severe clear skies :o)
At the office, thinking about going to MCO this evening.
No bike for me today. Rest day!
Sent a pic to Bender351 for his Twitter page :)
Going to DWC Lake Mary to see if they can true that rear wheel for me. Have to get the bike ready for the crit on Thursday!
It appears Bender351 is mastering Twitter. Now, if he could figure out how to upload a picture... LOL
Back from 2+ hr ride at the airport. 4 laps. Kept it in the small chainring with high cadence. Good recovery ride. Gorgeous weather, 82°.
Going home to shower, get something to eat, and watch a movie. Long day today! May go for a ride tomorrow.
GREAT day today! Good crowd and I even managed to win the CAT4/CAT5 race! Posted recap and pics to the Armada blog.
Course looks fine. A couple of areas need sweeping. Ready for a great race tomorrow morning!
Driving out to check out the crit's course to make sure everything's okay.
Stopped by the office to check emails. Now taking the bike to have the rear wheel trued.
Back from MCO. Only 3 laps, one in the pouring rain, so I called it a ride. A little breezy as always. Saw 2 other riders out there.
Checking the weather. May drive out to the 'port and do several laps just because...
I am FINALLY going home. Merry Christmas to everyone!
finally figured out how to add the Twitter link to the Armada blog. At least something that looks nice. I have a headache now!
is trying to get out of the office and go home to relax!
